message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product but can only go up to $85 right now.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $85 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. How about we split the difference and go with $95?
Hi Bob, I understand that $95 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $110.
Alice, I'm really trying to work with you here, but $110 is still out of my budget.  I'm happy to pay $90, but that's the absolute highest I can go.
Hi Bob, I understand that $90 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $100.
